title: k-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Distance based classification. 
To classify X: Find K closest points. Take majority vote. 
**Lazy Learner**: No training phase (just stores data). Slow at prediction time.

common_mistakes.correction: Crucial. Large scale features dominate distance.

interview_questions.question: What happens if K is very small?

summary: Show me your friends, I'll tell you who you are.
